Articles.Content: Rule 28: An eye for an eye, a tooth for a tooth. However, KSP does not follow 'A life for a life'. If we did, we\'d look less like humans and more like red mud. We don\'t actually follow any of the other statements either, because we\'d be blind, toothless people. Who wants that?
Rule 29: Modules? One rocket. One payload.
Rule 30: Never give up 8)
Rule 31: If it looks safe, you\'re doing it wrong.
Rule 32: Kick your radial boosters away with landing legs.
Rule 33: Never make jeb unhappy!

Eeeh yes...

Rule 42. USA faked Moon landing. Kerbals did it for real.
Rule 43: If youre rocket has less than 50 stages, you made it too small.
Rule 44: Kerbin will always be home to the Kerbals.
Rule 45: Aircraft should NOT have a pitch-happy mind of their own, no matter how entertaining the resulting explosion is.
Rule 46: Attempting to piece together wings from other wings that overlap in nonsensical ways will cause a craft to explode in a very Kerbal manner.
Rule 47: Never be afraid to kill youre crew.

\*your

Rule 48: Even Kerbals can spell properly... most of the time... when they\'re not being blown up... which is almost never.
Rule 49: The preferred take off direction from the Mun is horizontal.
Rule 50: Don\'t drive your cart at speeds far above the speed limit.
Rule 51- fire anyone who mentions safety
Rule 52 (old aviation superstition adapted): don\'t never ever *even think* of taking a screenshot before launching a mission!
Rule 53: never make rules.
